details.content: 10 years hands on experience in software design, implement and CI/CD flow.

details.label: Programming Languages
details.content: Java, Javascript, Typescript, Scala, Swift, C/C++

details.label: EC2 Load Balancing
details.content: Working on a new network service for cross boundary(accounts and VPCs) accessing experience.

details.label: Selling Partner Services
details.content: Designed and implemented a deferral accounting engine serve over 8 million daily transactions for finance team. Maintained accounting services for third party sellers.

details.label: VoIP Web App
details.content: Maintained and implemented the VoIP web App. Make it easy to be integrated into CRM platforms like salesforce and zendesk.

details.label: Developer Console
details.content: Designed and implemented Admin Console web App for simplifying on-call operations.

details.label: Xiaotaojiang
details.content: Rearchitected and implemented an e-commerce store iOS App with the newest Webkit framework. It’s hybrid with all the UI rendered in WebView and all the async requests handled by native Swift code.

details.label: QRCode Scanner
details.content: An App for scanning and reading QRCodes in Japan, automatically crawling and compare the prices on Amazon, Yahoo and other Japanese online stores. The crawlers were written in javascript with App as its orchestrator.

details.label: Customized Wi-Fi Firmware
details.content: Designed and implemented a Wi-Fi packets sniffing agent that can publishing the devices nearby by regularly detecting Wi-Fi probe requests. It’s based on Broadcom MIPS Linux system. Also, integrated iBeacon functionality to the Wi-Fi device with its onboard BLE chip

details.label: Wi-Fi Setup Smart Wizard
details.content: Designed and implemented an iOS App for Wi-Fi device inital setup with Bluetooth protocol.

details.label: Dev/Ops on big data cluster
details.content: Designed and maintained a data cluster with HDFS for storaging and analyzing 10s of TB Wi-Fi signal packet data.

details.label: DirectReader
details.content: Designed and implemented a cloud drive management App for user to easily share files between desktop and mobile devices.
